item.title: Social Distancing Isn't Enough
item.description: As the COVID-19 pandemic has progressed and people around the world have started to understand the dangers and the virulence of the SARS-CoV-2 virus, social distancing has been one of the mitigating strategies imposed everywhere. This is a highly necessary step in preventing the spread of the virus and flattening the curve. However, as some countries appear to be getting the spread of the virus under control there are already sounds about “opening up” certain countries.

item.title: Welcome to Operative Word
item.description: Welcome to to my site. I’m glad you found your way here.
